Ward–Pay 3 life. [i](Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays 3 life.)[/i]
[i]Stillness[/i] – Volke can't be blocked as long as he isn't attacking alone.
[i]Locktouch[/i] – Whenever Volke attacks and isn't blocked, he deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
[i]Lethality[/i] – Whenever Volke deals noncombat damage to a creature or planeswalker, destroy that permanent.
